descriptions: Wiki page

Software repository and documentation in https://github.com/marcospenedo/OpenSPM-source (users need to ask to join the project and being able to see and download software source files and documentation, however, it will be made public in the coming months)
The option to save datasets in pure HDF5 format.
The option to save datasets in HDF5-USID format.
HS-AFM head/base
High-speed high voltage amplifier
Open hardware SPM controller
OpenSPM control software
Workshop (2023) to build a complete open hardware SPM set to be used with our OpenSPM software platform, attended by Dr. Irit Goldian from Weizmann Institute of Science (WIS, Israel).
Online support sessions for Open Hardware controller builders.
Organized the OpenSPM 2024 (April) conference.
CSIR-Central Scientific Instruments Organisation (Chandigarh, India), which joined our initiative and currently uses our software in their SPMs.
Weizmann Institute of Science (WIS, Israel).
Chinese Academy of Science
Czech Metrology Institute, maintainers of the Gwyddion software suite, they implemented our formats (pure HDF5 and USID-HDF5) so can be read on that platform.
Quantum Design already integrated and sells our OpenSPM software platform together with its AFSEM-nano product
In collaboration with Nanosurf, we successfully integrated our OpenSPM software platform with its DriveAFM instrument
C-sense (Austria) & Alemnis, (Switzerland)
CSIR-Central Scientific Instruments Organisation (Chandigarh, India) SPM users.
Weizmann Institute of Science (WIS, Israel): 3 main users + users of the SPM user facility.
LBNI collaborators at EFPL (ca 10 users).
AFSEM-nano users through QD: ca 10 users at the moment.
Chinese Academy of Science: ca. 6 users

repositories_catalogues.reasoning: Although the initial document section reported no outputs, a table on page 7 explicitly provides data for one new/enhanced repository/catalogue with both description and URL. This information is taken verbatim from the table.

datasets_databases.reasoning: Descriptions for two outputs are verbatim in the table, but the explicit quantity field is blank or 0 as shown in the data. Per extraction rules, report zero for quantity, but preserve both detailed descriptions with citations from page 7.

config.system_prompt:
EXTRACTION STRATEGY:
  1. PRIMARY: Look for data in the specified location/table/section
  2. FALLBACK: If not found, search broader document context for semantically equivalent information
  3. FLEXIBILITY: Allow for format variations, OCR errors, and synonym usage

  LOCATION FLEXIBILITY:
  - Handle table format variations (column/row order, spacing, naming)
  - Consider synonyms and equivalent terms
  - Account for OCR/parsing errors that may affect document quality

  QUALITY STANDARDS:
  - Extract actual values found in the document
  - If uncertain, provide best interpretation with appropriate confidence
  - Only return null if the information category truly doesn't exist
  - Convert abbreviated amounts (k=1000) to full numbers where applicable
  

  REPORT OUTPUT FOCUS:
  - 15 standard output categories in "List of Outputs" table
  - Each category: quantity number, descriptions list, URLs list
  - Separate descriptions from URLs even when mixed in same cell
  - Academic collaborations vs Industrial partnerships (distinct categories)
  - Preserve all detailed descriptions and web addresses
